00014 #ifndef levelmeterH
00015 #define levelmeterH
00016 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #include "primarydriver.h"
00018 #include "xnodeconnector.h"
00019 
00020 class XScalarEntry;
00021 
00022 class XLevelMeter : public XPrimaryDriver
00023 {
00024     XNODE_OBJECT
00025 protected:
00026     XLevelMeter(const char *name, bool runtime,
00027               const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00028               const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00029               const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00030               const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00031 public:
00032     //! usually nothing to do
00033     virtual ~XLevelMeter() {}
00034     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00035     virtual void showForms();
00036  
00037     //! Records
00038     unsigned int channelNumRecorded() const {return m_levelRecorded.size();}
00039     double levelRecorded(unsigned int ch) const {return m_levelRecorded[ch];}
00040 protected:
00041     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00042     virtual void start();
00043     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00044     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00045     virtual void stop();
00046   
00047     //! this is called when raw is written 
00048     //! unless dependency is broken
00049     //! convert raw to record
00050     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00051     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00052     //! record is readLocked
00053     virtual void visualize();
00054   
00055     //! driver specific part below
00056 protected:
00057     //! register channel names in your constructor
00058     //! \param channel_names array of pointers to channel name. ends with null pointer.
00059     void createChannels(const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00060                         const char **channel_names);
00061 
00062     virtual double getLevel(unsigned int ch) = 0;
00063 private:
00064  
00065     shared_ptr<XThread<XLevelMeter> > m_thread;
00066   
00067     //! Records
00068     std::vector<double> m_levelRecorded;
00069 
00070     std::deque<shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> > m_entries;
00071     
00072     void *execute(const atomic<bool> &);  
00073 };
